Pet Guide

< Back

Hunger:

When you get to zero feeds, if you click it will give you 5 feeds and feed your pet (sum of 4), but will cost 10 bond points. If hunger reaches 10 you will lose 35 bond points!

Play:

Playing a game gives you 17 bond points but costs 2 hunger.
